LanguageData.CW_Accelerator.label: accelerator
LanguageData.CW_Accelerator.description: A heavy cybernetic weapon system. The inner coils of this monstrum are switched on and off in a precisely timed sequence, causing the hybrid projectiles to be accelerated quickly along the barrel via magnetic forces. Swaps between ammunition on toggle.
LanguageData.CW_Accelerator.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.CW_Accelerator.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.CW_Accelerator.verbs.Singularity.label: Singularity
LanguageData.CW_Accelerator.verbs.Charged.label: Charged
LanguageData.CW_Accelerator.verbs.Double_Time.label: Double Time
LanguageData.CW_Disruptor.label: disruptor
LanguageData.CW_Disruptor.description:
A heavy handgun with an electron orb generator to disrupt single targets. The adjustable power system was originally made for non lethal strikes and knocks out any humanoid on a single hit. Standard overseer equipment on Jailplanets.
This upgraded version has access to four different fire modes.
LanguageData.CW_Disruptor.tools.grip.label: grip
LanguageData.CW_Disruptor.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.CW_Disruptor.tools.Blade.label: Blade
LanguageData.CW_Disruptor.verbs.Electron_Orb.label: Electron Orb
LanguageData.CW_Disruptor.verbs.Ultra_EMP.label: Ultra EMP
LanguageData.CW_Disruptor.verbs.Stunning_Force.label: Stunning Force
LanguageData.CW_DualEraser.label: dual eraser
LanguageData.CW_DualEraser.description:
A pair of rapid fire machine pistols in form of two compact twin erasers with huge magazines for dual wielding purposes. The immense firepower like its multi shot comes at the price of low precision. Found on high criminal Urbworlds, where narrow alleys are present. Can be mounted on cybernetics for faster reloads on close up targets.
Made for Akimbo.
LanguageData.CW_DualEraser.tools.grip.label: grip
LanguageData.CW_DualEraser.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.CW_DualEraser.verbs.Multi_Shot.label: Multi Shot
LanguageData.CW_DualEraser.verbs.Rapid_Fire.label: Rapid Fire
LanguageData.CW_NapalmBlaster.label: napalm blaster
LanguageData.CW_NapalmBlaster.description:
A heavy flamethrower with a napalm tank attached to it. This mechanical incendiary device was developed to project a long, controllable stream of liquid fire.
The heat level can be conveniently adjusted by a builtin pyromancy controller.
LanguageData.CW_NapalmBlaster.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.CW_NapalmBlaster.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.CW_NapalmBlaster.verbs.Fahrenheit.label: Fahrenheit
LanguageData.CW_NapalmBlaster.verbs.Infernal.label: Infernal
LanguageData.CW_NapalmBlaster.verbs.Hellfire.label: Hellfire
